text: I wanted to understand the options such as hardwire, plug-in, battery-operated, remote control, floor standing, ceiling-mounted, wall-mounted, table stand, spotlight, floodlight, the type of light bulbs it uses. If this is battery-operated, then you replace the battery or charge the battery. Can you conceal the wires? All of those options were important to me as I was making my decision and brainstorming on the project and making final selection.
